name: Guerilla War
description:
Guerilla War is an arcade game developed by Quicksilver Software and Data East USA. It came out on 01-01-1987. SNK published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Guerilla War on PC and NES.
Eikichi Kawasaki produced the game. It was directed by Koji Obata. It was scored by Kazuhiro Nishida, Toshikazu Tanaka and Yoko Osaka.
